sentences.english: She's just a shell of who she once was.'

sentences.english: Life truly wears them down and out and there is nothing but a shell of a person left.

definition: to linger/to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home
cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle
